channel.title: Politics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Politics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Controversy Brewing Over McMahon Visiting N.J. School
item.description: Education Secretary Linda McMahon is visiting a New Jersey middle school Friday, and not everyone is pleased.

item.title: Nancy Mace targets fraud with bill to require photo on SNAP EBT cards
item.description: In an effort to cut down on fraud, Republican Rep. Rep. Nancy Mace of South Carolina is pushing a proposal to require a photo on SNAP EBT cards

item.title: Mamdani breaks with Adams, vows NYC will stop clearing homeless encampments in January
item.description: NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani vows to end homeless encampment sweeps that Eric Adams started, citing failed results and lack of housing connections.

item.title: Tom Homan fumes at protester who called him racist during clash at TPUSA event: 'Grow a backbone'

item.title: Trump Administration to Direct More Water to California Farms
item.description: The Trump administration is making good on a promise to send more water to California farmers in the state's crop-rich Central Valley.

item.title: First Lady Lights National Tree After President Counts Down
item.description: First lady Melania Trump lit the National Christmas Tree on a chilly Thursday night in the nation's capital.
